data.title: Contact Department of Finance
data.text:
Mail

Important: Do not send payments to any of the addresses below. Mailing addresses for property tax, business & excise tax, parking ticket, and camera violation payments are listed on the Payment Mailing Addresses page.

General correspondence (do not send payments to this address):

NYC Department of Finance

Correspondence Unit

1 Centre Street, 22nd Floor

New York, NY 10007

Please note: The address above is for mailing correspondence through postal mail. Walk-ins will not be seen at this location. You can visit us in person at a Department of Finance business center.

Forms & Applications

All Department of Finance forms and applications should be submitted to the mailing address indicated on the form or application. If you have questions, call 311 or contact the Department of Finance.

Parking

For parking violation hearings by mail:

NYC Department of Finance

Parking Hearing by Mail

Cadman Plaza Station

P.O. Box 29021

Brooklyn, NY 11202-9021

Property

To submit property tax exemption applications:

NYC Department of Finance

P.O. Box 311

Maplewood, NJ 07040-0311

Business tax returns

Business tax return addresses may vary. For mailing information, use the address listed on the form for the current year.

Legal papers

In order to serve legal papers on the Commissioner or the Department of Finance, mail to:
